articles.description: Core talent, contrasting personalities and classic matches - Jannik Sinner and Carlos Alcaraz resume their rivalry in the Wimbledon final.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025: Jannik Sinner and Carlos Alcaraz resume absorbing rivalry in men's final

articles.description: India, who were riled by England's tactics at the end of play, wasted time themselves earlier in the match, bowling coach Tim Southee says.
articles.title: England v India: Shubman Gill's tourists had no right to complain about hosts delaying tactics

articles.description: Johanna Rytting Kaneryd says Sweden can go "the whole way" at Euro 2025 because "there is something different" about this squad.
articles.title: Women's Euro 2025: 'Something different' about Sweden, but Germany 'won't destruct'

articles.description: Few would have predicted Iga Swiatek's best Grand Slam result so far this season would come at Wimbledon - including herself.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025 results: How Iga Swiatek flew under radar to lift sixth Grand Slam title and first on grass

articles.description: Jack van Poortvliet scores a last-gasp try in San Juan to hand England a dramatic victory and an impressive 2-0 series win over Argentina.
articles.title: Argentina 17-22 England: Visitors claim 2-0 series win with victory in San Juan

articles.description: England finish the T20 series against India with a closely fought win, but this cannot paper over the cracks regarding the improvement needed before next year's home T20 World Cup.
articles.title: England v India: Series defeat gives hosts 'wake-up call' with T20 World Cup a year away

articles.description: A place in the quarter-finals is up for grabs as defending champions England and tournament debutants Wales go head-to-head.
articles.title: Euro 2025: England and Wales prepare for battle of the home nations

articles.description: Rory McIlroy is in prime position for another Scottish Open title after surging to a share of the lead with an imposing third-round 66.
articles.title: Scottish Open: Rory McIlroy shares lead heading into final day

articles.description: Wimbledon runner-up Amanda Anisimova says "froze" in a heavy defeat by Iga Swiatek in her first Grand Slam final.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025: Amanda Anisimova 'froze' in heavy defeat by Iga Swiatek

articles.description: Huw Jones seizes his chance, Jac Morgan impresses again, Owen Farrell looks sharp and Hugo Keenan show his resilience as the Lions look to the first Test.
articles.title: British and Irish Lions 2025: Latest on Garry Ringrose, Huw Jones, Owen Farrell, Jac Morgan & Hugo Keenan
